summary: Checks if all elements are true
description:
Checks if all elements are true in a datacube `x` (*`all(x)`*).

The operand must be a datacube.


The result is a scalar number. Operand elements which are null are ignored while computing the result.

The element type of the result depends on the element type of the operand:

```
| operand type   | result type   |
|----------------|---------------|
| bool           | bool          |
```

returns.description: The computed Checks if all elements are true of `x`; null elements are ignored.

links.title: Documentation on operations resulting in scalar values in rasdaman
